name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Jinan, Shandong Today
A child fell ill in the quarantine center, but the ambulance was delayed, and the public argued with the epidemic prevention staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Wanyuan New Town, Hongqiao Town, Minhang District, Shanghai
Due to a close contact, a notice was issued at 1:20 am on December 2 to seal off the community
Starting at 6 pm this evening, people gathered to demand the lifting of the lockdown

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Tianjin begins to show signs of relaxation
The 72-hour nucleic acid test certificate inspection has been cancelled in all public places that have been opened in the city, such as vegetable markets, supermarkets, restaurants, and urban transportation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shenzhen
Starting tomorrow (December 3), when taking the bus or subway, you only need a green code, and there is no need to check the 48-hour nucleic acid negative certificate or 24-hour nucleic acid test record. The Shenzhen Municipal Transportation Bureau will issue an announcement around 8:30 tomorrow morning.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Tonight, Wuhan Hua'anli residents pushed aside the isolation wall and lifted the lockdown

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Tonight, Wuhan Hua'anli residents pushed open the isolation wall and unblocked themselves.
It is reported that this is a clothing industrial park in the urban village.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, I don’t have any latest information about the first person who held up the white paper in this incident - the student from Nanjing University of Communication.

content: I can't confirm his gender/name at this time

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I would like to add one more thing. Last time at a very important event, I reported a boy with long hair as a girl. Please understand.

The current situation in Jining, Shandong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yesterday, a rally in support of the people in China was also held in Auckland, New Zealand

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Residents of Zhilan Mansion in Qufu City, Shandong Province expressed dissatisfaction with the epidemic prevention regulations at around 18:00 on the evening of December 2.
It is reported that after Zhilan Mansion was unsealed in the afternoon of the same day, it was sealed again within three hours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shandong University of Technology, Zibo, Shandong, asked students who were going home today to take nucleic acid tests at 4 a.m. because the school was suspected of having a positive case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Many netizens said that Shandong's quarantine centers are still pulling students in for isolation, which they call "filling the cabins."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Many netizens have submitted articles to me. There is no sign of the city being unsealed.
Considering the lag in policies, it may take until various units and institutions hold meetings during the day to get specific notices. Therefore, I hope you will also pay attention to changes in your local policies and submit articles to me after I wake up.
I will also continue to update on the changes in China's epidemic policies.
Because this is what everyone fought for by taking to the streets.
I'll stop here today. Thank you everyone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yesterday, an international student at Berkeley set fire to the memorial site, causing damage to the building with more than a hundred years of history.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Currently, the discussion topic about the postponement of the postgraduate entrance examination on Weibo has been blocked.
It is reported that this unified examination, which has 5 million participants this year, is the only large-scale examination that has not been cancelled.
In the past few days, a large number of students have called on Weibo to postpone the examination.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Beijing's situation today:
Many nucleic acid test sites have been evacuated
Only subways and buses do not require nucleic acid test, but nucleic acid test certificates are required to enter other indoor places.
Therefore, people still need to find nucleic acid test sites everywhere and queue up for nucleic acid test
Similar situations have occurred in Shijiazhuang and other places before.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today, residents of Shimao Capital in Wuxi, Jiangsu Province, demanded the lifting of the blockade, and in the process some residents drove their cars through the guardrails.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shanghai Xujing District Zijun Mansion 
There was a positive case in one household, which led to the temporary control of the community for two days. The owner disagreed with the closure of the community, which led to a dispute with the epidemic prevention personnel and the neighborhood committee, and then an owner was arrested

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that only one building with a positive resident was sealed off in the morning, but because that household traveled with four other neighbors, the measure of sealing off the community was taken.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The community is located in Xujing Town, Qingpu District, Shanghai.
Apologies to everyone
